info.title: Amazon RDS Parameter Group API
info.description: The API for managing Amazon RDS Parameter Groups

get.summary: Copies the specified DB parameter group.
get.description: Copies the specified DB parameter group.

parameters.name: SourceDBParameterGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier or ARN for the source DB parameter group.        For information about          creating an ARN,         see           Constructing an RDS Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

parameters.name: Tags.member.N
parameters.description: A list of tags.

parameters.name: TargetDBParameterGroupDescription
parameters.description: A description for the copied DB parameter group.

parameters.name: TargetDBParameterGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the copied DB parameter group.

get.summary: Creates a new DB parameter group.
get.description: Creates a new DB parameter group.

parameters.name: DBParameterGroupFamily
parameters.description: The DB parameter group family name. A DB parameter group can be             associated with one and only one DB parameter group family, and             can be applied only to a DB instance running a database engine and engine version             compatible with that DB parameter group family.

parameters.name: DBParameterGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the DB parameter group.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description for the DB parameter group.

parameters.name: Tags.member.N
parameters.description: A list of tags.

parameters.name: DBParameterGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the DB parameter group.

get.summary: Returns a list of DBParameterGroup descriptions.
get.description: Returns a list of DBParameterGroup descriptions.

parameters.name: DBParameterGroupName
parameters.description: The name of a specific DB parameter group to return details for.

parameters.name: Filters.member.N
parameters.description: This parameter is not currently supported.

parameters.name: Marker
parameters.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous        DescribeDBParameterGroups request.            If this parameter is specified, the response includes        only records beyond the marker,        up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response.        If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value,            a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so that the remaining        results can be retrieved.

get.summary: Returns the detailed parameter list for a particular DB parameter group.
get.description: Returns the detailed parameter list for a particular DB parameter group.

parameters.name: DBParameterGroupName
parameters.description: The name of a specific DB parameter group to return details for.

parameters.name: Filters.member.N
parameters.description: This parameter is not currently supported.

parameters.name: Marker
parameters.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous        DescribeDBParameters request.            If this parameter is specified, the response includes        only records beyond the marker,        up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response.        If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value,            a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so that the remaining        results can be retrieved.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The parameter types to return.

get.summary: Modifies the parameters of a DB parameter group.
get.description: Modifies the parameters of a DB parameter group.

parameters.name: DBParameterGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the DB parameter group.

parameters.name: Parameters.member.N
parameters.description: An array of parameter names, values, and the apply method        for the parameter update. At least one parameter name,        value, and apply method must be supplied; subsequent arguments are optional.        A maximum of 20 parameters can be modified in a single request.

get.summary: Modifies the parameters of a DB parameter group to the engine/system default value.
get.description: Modifies the parameters of a DB parameter group to the engine/system default value.

parameters.name: DBParameterGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the DB parameter group.

parameters.name: Parameters.member.N
parameters.description: An array of parameter names, values, and the apply method        for the parameter update. At least one parameter name,        value, and apply method must be supplied; subsequent arguments are optional.        A maximum of 20 parameters can be modified in a single request.

parameters.name: ResetAllParameters
parameters.description: Specifies whether (true) or not (false) to reset all parameters        in the DB parameter group to default values.
